sourcesContent:
<script>
export default {
  name: 'app',
  data() {
    return {
      api_key: '6c07b7050c30876a4e88cfbb4dee8dc3',
      url_base: 'https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/',
      query: '',
      weather: {},
    };
  },

  methods: {
    fetchWeather(e) {
      if (e.key == "Enter") {
        fetch(`${this.url_base}weather?q=${this.query}&units=imperial&APPID=${this.api_key}`)
          .then(res => res.json())
          .then(this.setResults);
      }
    },

    setResults(results) {
      this.weather = results;

      if (this.weather.weather && this.weather.weather[0]) {
        const weatherCondition = this.weather.weather[0].main.toLowerCase();

        console.log('Weather condition:', weatherCondition);

        const conditionMap = {
          clear: 'clear',
          clouds: 'clouds',
          rain: 'rain',
          drizzle: 'drizzle',
          thunderstorm: 'thunderstorm',
          snow: 'snow',
          mist: 'mist',
          haze: 'mist',
        };

        const conditionClass = conditionMap[weatherCondition] || 'default';

        const appElement = document.getElementById('app');
        if (appElement) {
          appElement.className = '';
          appElement.classList.add(conditionClass);
        } else {
          console.error('App element not found.');
        }
      } else {
        console.error('Weather data is missing or incomplete:', this.weather);
      }
    },

    dateBuilder() {
      const d = new Date();
      const months = [
        "January", "February", "March", "April", "May", "June",
        "July", "August", "September", "October", "November", "December"
      ];
      const days = [
        "Sunday", "Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday", "Thursday", "Friday", "Saturday"
      ];

      const day = days[d.getDay()];
      const date = d.getDate();
      const month = months[d.getMonth()];
      const year = d.getFullYear();

      return `${day} ${date} ${month} ${year}`;
    },
  },
};
</script>
